timeline.message: fix mvn website build to use mvn supplied nodejs, fix broken redirects, move block from custom.css to custom.scss so will be correctly generated

timeline.bodyText: How did you find these broken links? I wonder if we could add a way to detect these dead links automatically.
timeline.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText: obviously, no need to do anything in this PR - I was just curious...
replies.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText:
We actually have this, both for normal links and these redirects, and it is how I found them, not sure why it wasn't failing the build though:
On line 35 could not find anchor 'firehoses' in 'ingestion/native-batch.html'
On line 50 target development/integrating-druid-with-other-technologies.html does not exist
On line 76 target operations/recommendations.html does not exist
On line 162 could not find anchor 'firehoses' in 'ingestion/native-batch.html'
There are 4 issues with the redirects
replies.author: clintropolis
